main event: Pilot and co-pilot observed a very bright light descending from the northwest and moving erratically.
interesting points: The object appeared to be descending in a northern direction., The sighting lasted for about 10-15 minutes., The object passed about 30-35 degrees above the horizon., The object appeared to be ascending toward the tail of the aircraft., The report originates from a Project Blue Book record card dated 2/2/1961.
sighted object: a very bright light in the sky
